description:
Since I started learning how to code, I was always told that “a good developer is lazy”. What better tool for a lazy developer than a lazy programing language?!


Laziness at the language level means delaying computation until the last moment when it is needed. This also means we can model and use data structures with infinite elements!


In this 0 slides presentation, I will be live coding my way into Kotlin Sequences and show you how to use them for maximum laziness!


Key takeaways:

  • Understand the difference between Kotlin List and Sequence
  • Similarities and differences with Java Stream
  • Learn the different ways to build Sequences
  • How Sequences can be used in a few practical examples from adventofcode.com to fractal generation!
title: The lazy Kotlin developer
